https://tmrev.io/movie/21557-A Thousand Desires Like These 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ep3OlvEP2T59tr7hIgvpST501ao.jpg Set against the backdrop of the Indian Emergency, the movie tells the story of three youngsters in the 70s, when India was undergoing massive social and political changes. The movie's title is taken from the couplet of Urdu poet Mirza Ghalib. A Thousand Desires Like These
